text: With 24 essential vitamins & minerals, 0.5g sugar and 16g protein in every 237ml drink,BOOST® CarbSmartoffers balanced nutrition for those seeking a low sugar, high protein option.FormerlyBOOST® Diabetic*96% less sugar thanBOOST Originalper 237ml
